_comment: Created by ianb on 03/10/2013 13:31:55 using v0.9
analysis_commentary: Employment in the general population has been falling steadily throughout the period (-2.8% between quarter 3 2006/07 and quarter 1 2011/12), whereas employment of people with LTCs has been broadly steady. This has resulted in a narrowing of the gap between the two rates (from 15.2% in 2006/07 to 11.9% in quarter 2 2011/12). Since 2010, employment rates in both groups have been steady.
